gameMode.label: Game Mode
gameMode.tooltip: The ranked game mode to retrieve current stats for.

responseStr.value: @$username $ign rank in $mode: $division ($tp TP) Smite Guru elo: $elo (more info: $sg_page).
responseStr.label: Response Format
responseStr.tooltip:
The format for the response message.
   $ign: Your smite IGN.
   $mode: The game mode being used.
   $division: Your current division.
   $tp: Your current TP value.
   $elo: Your smite guru elo.
   $sg_page: Your smite guru page.
   $username: The name of the chat user to call the command.
   $matches: The total number of matches played.
   $wins: The total number of wins.
   $losses: The total number of losses.
   $winrate: The win rate.
   $percentile: The percentile of players you are in.

command.label: Command
command.tooltip: The command used to execute this script
